description: This is a Flutter widget for the home screen of the application, providing feature navigation and personalized greeting based on user data.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the home screen of the app, displaying user info and navigation features.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the home screen, including app bar, greeting, and feature grid.

methods.name: _buildFeatureCard
methods.description: Creates a card widget for a feature, with icon, title, subtitle, color, and tap action.
